title: The Pirate Queen: The Story of Grace O'Malley, Irish Pirate
description: A meticulously detailed, fictional portrait of the legendary Irish pirate describes how Grace O'Malley built a powerful empire that became the terror of the English on the high seas and chronicles her daring exploits in defiance of English rule during the Elizabethan era. By the author of Warrior Queen. Reader's Guide included. Original.
author: Alan Gold
